channel.title: Welcome to the Badger Invitational! on Badger Invitational
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to the Badger Invitational! on Badger Invitational

item.title: Registration
item.description: Thank you for your interest in the 2020-21 Badger Invitational. Registration is now open. In order to register teams, you must complete all of the steps on this page. There is a limit of 4 teams per school and a $50 registration fee associated with each team. 1. Register online, both via this Google Form and in Scilympiad. First, fill out this Google Form with all the requisite information. Make sure to hit submit so that your response is recorded.

item.title: Results
item.description: We are using Avogadro for tournament results. You can find the placings for Division B here and Division C here.
